title: Transformers Trilogy 2007-2011 1080p Rifftrax 6ch 2ch v2
description:

Transformers: Dark Of The Moon (2011)
Rifftrax released 2011.11.29 2hour34min40sec 3,254,425,809bytes
intro: 1s after the end of DisembAudio's (quiet) singing
 <a href=" http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1399103/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1399103/</a>  

video: 1920x800 AVC
audio1 (default): movie plus Rifftrax AAC 2.0
audio2: just movie AAC 5.1
audio3: just movie AAC 2.0
subs: English built in, off by default, not hard coded, software switchable
Riffers: Bill Corbett, Kevin Murphy, Mike Nelson 

This version2 has the following changes:
* newly remastered 2.0 Riff track using Chris's Dynamic Compressor on the movie and Level Speech on the riffs
* new 2.0 Riff audio audio track has more balanced and understandable riff and movie dialog
* the volume range for the riffs is much, much more consistent so even very quiet riff words are clear
* with v1 some riffs were hard to hear but with v2 the riffs are very clear
* the v2 movie audio has better fidelity, especially in loud parts
* the quietest movie dialog is now louder and easier to hear and loudest movie parts are a little quieter
* v2 2.0 Riffs are about 192Kbps vs v1 Riffs at about 160Kbps
* as with v1, the 5.1 Movie and 2.0 Movie audio tracks are unprocessed
* Transformers1: fixed subs from 1.53.04 onwards; the old subs just said "Line 1xyz"
* Transformers2 and Transformers3: the movie songs during the credits with DisembAudio singing are quieter than the peak riff volume

This is a remux with the Rifftrax commentary added as the default audio track. The Rifftrax audio track has been newly remastered to ensure the riff comments are just loud enough to be clear when the movie is loud and not too loud when the movie is quiet. Please leave any feedback regarding the Rifftrax audio remastering.

Big thanks to the posters of the 1080p/5.1 encodes of the movies, the subs and the chapters.
